forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow before 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. North northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.
